forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High 17F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High -9C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 11F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low -12C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 34F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 1C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 28F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -3C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 36F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 2C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early changing to mixed rain and snow later in the day. High 36F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 2C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 26F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low -3C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h.
